title: how do u beat ap malphite top
body: How can you beat a malphite that just ignites and ults to one shot at level 6 or does that to have a 100% kill gank?

replies.body: I personally find someone with a knockback helps, especially click 2 win knockbacks or escapes, i personally like Vayne and Ezreal, since malphite has to be close and up and personal, champions like gnar and garen also work, darius illaoi and rammus are also included, that and for ganking ap malph, use a champion like leesin or anything that can CC him and deny him of damage on you, hope this helps!

AP Malphite only exists in low elo, or played by trollers. This is because real players punish him before he gets items, especially if hes in the support role. Tell your jungler to gank him if hes mid or top and building AP. Slow as heck, easy kills, rinse and repeat, take his tower, snowball game.
I had to laugh - recently had an AP Malphite top in my team vs enemy Ekko and they didn't punish him, so he went something like 15-2-15, low elo in a nutshell really.

Malphite is quite slow, so try to only last hit,not push up the wave so your jungler can jump in for an easy gank. {{item:3102}}  is a good item as its passive blocks one of his abilities, other items include {{item:3026}}  and {{item:3065}}  for some heavy mr. May i ask what champ you are playing against him?
or if you're ap, maybe get a zhonias. nothing funnier than a malphite ulting and then you go zhonias and dodge it and he's just like... ok nevermind I'm going to walk away now.

Malphite is really strong mid game after 1-2 items, however his early game is pretty weak (his mana costs are kind of ridiculous, especially maxing/poking with Q). Try to bully him pre-6 to reduce his potential in mid game. If he's using ult to kill in lane, then that denies his team a lot of map pressure - he can't TP+Ult gank bot lane so look to make plays for your team that way instead.
If he's building AP, you should be able to beat him late game if he isn't too far ahead as he'll be squishy (and if he's building tank, his late game damage is minimal and most ADCs can kill him easily enough). Hope that helps!
